preTitle: Cisco Attack Surface Management (formerly Cisco Secure Cloud Insights)
title: Get faster hybrid cloud visibility and protection
subtitle: Improve security monitoring and cut emerging threats on your attack surface by including exposure management concepts into asset discovery and relationship-mapping with ongoing visibility.
description: To protect against threats, organizations require network visibility and control and the capacity to respond swiftly. Cisco Attack Surface Management identifies weak points in near real-time enabling rapid response.

benefits.title: Fully examine your attack surface
benefits.description: Relationship mapping makes it possible to reduce risks and meet compliance. With 100 predefined API integrations, you can examine everything in your environment and secure your attack surface.

benefits.title: Manage compliance and vulnerabilities
benefits.description: Manage compliance and security posture by monitoring relationships between hybrid IT and multiple clouds. Choose from over 800 premade queries, or customize your own, to find security gaps and misconfigurations.

benefits.title: Get a unified view of assets
benefits.description: Cisco Attack Surface Management, a Cisco XDR component, can provide a broad inventory of all entities and current security risks to identify and remediate misconfigured cloud environments and asset vulnerabilities.

benefits.title: Baseline behavior with Secure Cloud Analytics
benefits.description: Secure digital environments by combining situational awareness of Secure Cloud Analytics with structural awareness of Cisco Attack Surface Management for visibility of vulnerabilities and anomaly-based threat vectors.

integrations.title: Device Insights

integrations.title: Cisco Secure Workload

title: Twice as fast, twice the capacity: Meet your new campus core

description: Serious security. Exceptional automation. Analytics, speed, and scale. Bring it all to your access network.

benefits.title: Secure your network from the inside out
benefits.description: Experience the dream team: Cisco's industry-leading security portfolio plus Talos threat intelligence, Encrypted Traffic Analytics, trustworthy solutions, and MACsec encryption.

benefits.title: Make it highly resilient
benefits.description: Make your network resilient with exceptional mean time between failure (MTBF) and high-availability features such as in-service software upgrade (ISSU), graceful insertion and removal (GIR), and hot-patching.

benefits.title: Set up your network your way
benefits.description: Simplify and automate onboarding. Seamlessly integrate with full-stack programmability from application-specific integrated circuits (ASICs) to OS. Enable future features without hardware upgrades and create exceptional user experiences with the Cisco Catalyst Center platform.

benefits.title: Gain faster access with a faster core
benefits.description: Catalyst 9600 Series Switches are twice as fast and offer twice the capacity of traditional switches.

dataModals.title: Chassis
dataModals.content: C9606R. Modular core for resilience at scale, plus comprehensive security. 25.6 Tbps switching capacity, 6.4 Tbps per slot supporting 400G to 10G multigigabit.

dataModals.title: Supervisor engines
dataModals.content: C9600X-SUP-2. Made for secure and highly available high-speed campus core deployments. Based on Cisco Silicone One Q200 ASIC, supports up to 6.4 Tbps per slot, up to 400G QSFP-DD, and 50G SFP56. C9600-SUP-1. Designed to reimagine connections, reinforce security, and redefine the hybrid workplace. Based on Cisco UADP 3.0 ASIC, supports up to 2.4 Tbps per slot, up to 100G QSFP28, and 25G SFP28.

dataModals.title: Catalyst 9600X fiber line cards
dataModals.content: C9600X-LC-32CD. High-density fiber line cards for campus core. 30-port 100G/40G (QSFP28) and 2-port 400G/200G/100G (QSFP-DD). Up to 128 ports, non-blocking. C9600X-SUP-2 only. C9600X-LC-56YL4C. High-density fiber line cards for campus core and distribution. 56-port 50G/25G/10G (SFP56) and 4-port 100G (QSFP28). Up to 240 ports, non-blocking. C9600X-SUP-2 only. C9600-LC-40YL4CD. High-density fiber line cards for campus core and distribution. 40-port 50G/25G/10G (SFP56) and 2-port 400G (QSFP-DD) and 2-port 200G (QSFP56) with C9600X-SUP-2. 40-port 25G/10G (SFP28) and 2-port 100G/40G (QSFP28) with C9600-SUP-1.

dataModals.title: Catalyst 9600 line cards
dataModals.content: C9600-LC-24C. Higher-density fiber line cards for evolving campus core. 24-port 100G/40G (QSFP28) with C9600X-SUP-2. 24-port 40G (QSFP+) or 12-port 100G (QSFP28) with C9600-SUP-1. C9600-LC-48YL. High-density 50G/25G fiber line cards for campus core and distribution. 48-port 50G/25G/10G (SFP56) with C9600X-SUP-2. 48-port 25G/10G/1G (SFP56) with C9600-SUP-1. C9600-LC-48TX. High-density copper line cards for campus distribution. Built for secure Wi-Fi 6/6E and high-speed access. 48-port 10G with C9600X-SUP-2. 48-port 10G/5G/2.5G/1G multigigabit with C9600-SUP-1. C9600-LC-48S. High-density 1G (SFP) fiber line cards for campus distribution. C9600-SUP-1 only.

Based on Cisco UADP 2.0 ASIC. C9300-48H. Optimized for wired and wireless converged access, with 48-port 1G/100M, 90W PoE. 40G, 25G, 10G, 1G fiber and 10G multigigabit copper modular uplink options. Based on Cisco UADP 2.0 ASIC.

dataModals.title: Catalyst 9300 60W PoE models
dataModals.content: C9300-24U, C9300-48U. Optimized for wired and wireless converged access, with 24- and 48-port 1G/100M, 60W PoE. 40G, 25G, 10G, 1G fiber and 10G multigigabit copper modular uplink options. Based on Cisco UADP 2.0 ASIC. Orderable with Meraki cloud-management experience. C9300-24UX. Built for secure Wi-Fi 6/6E high-speed access and beyond. 24-port 10GBASE-T, 10G/5G/2.5G/1G/100M multigigabit, 60W PoE. 40G, 25G, 10G, 1G fiber and 10G multigigabit copper modular uplink options. Based on Cisco UADP 2.0 ASIC. Orderable with Meraki cloud-management experience. C9300-48UN. Built for secure Wi-Fi 6/6E high-speed access. 48-port 5G/2.5G/1G/100M multigigabit, 60W PoE. 40G, 25G, 10G, 1G fiber and 10G multigigabit copper modular uplink options. Based on Cisco UADP 2.0 ASIC. Orderable with Meraki cloud-management experience.

dataModals.title: Catalyst 9300 1G models
dataModals.content: C9300-24T, C9300-48T. 24- and 48-port 1G/100M copper, data only. 40G, 25G, 10G, 1G fiber and 10G multigigabit copper modular uplink options. Based on Cisco UADP 2.0 ASIC. Orderable with Meraki cloud-management experience. Based on Cisco UADP 2.0 ASIC. Orderable with Meraki cloud-management experience. Based on Cisco UADP 2.0 ASIC. Orderable with Meraki cloud-management experience.

dataModals.title: Catalyst 9300L models
dataModals.content: C9300L-24T-xx, C9300L-48T-xx. 24- and 48-port 1G/100M copper, data only. Four 10G (-4X) or 1G (-4G) fixed fiber uplink options. Based on Cisco UADP 2.0 ASIC. The 10G uplink models are orderable with Meraki cloud-management experience. C9300L-24P-xx, C9300L-48P-xx. 24- and 48-port 1G/100M copper, 30W PoE. Four 10G (-4X) or 1G (-4G) fixed fiber uplink options. Based on Cisco UADP 2.0 ASIC. The 10G uplink models are orderable with Meraki cloud-management experience. C9300L-48PF-4X, C9300L-48PF-4G. 48-port 1G/100M copper, 30W PoE. Four 10G (-4X) or 1G (-4G) fixed fiber uplink options. Based on Cisco UADP 2.0 ASIC. The 10G uplink models are orderable with Meraki cloud-management experience. C9300L-24UXG-4X, C9300L-24UXG-2Q. 24-port 60W PoE, 8-port 10GBASE-T, 10G/5G/2.5G/1G/100M multigigabit, 16-port 1G. Four 10G (-4X) or two 40G (-2Q) fixed fiber uplink options. Based on Cisco UADP 2.0 ASIC. The 10G uplink models are orderable with Meraki cloud-management experience. C9300L-48UXG-4X, C9300L-48UXG-2Q. 48-port 60W PoE, 12-port 10GBASE-T, 10G/5G/2.5G/1G/100M multigigabit, 36-port 1G. Four 10G (-4X) or two 40G (-2Q) fixed fiber uplink options. Based on Cisco UADP 2.0 ASIC. The 10G uplink models are orderable with Meraki cloud-management experience. C9300L-48UX-4Y. 48-port 60W PoE, 8-port 10GBASE-T, 10G/5G/2.5G/1G/100M multigigabit, 40-port 1G. Two 25G fixed fiber uplinks. Based on Cisco UADP 2.0 ASIC.

title: ​​Build high-performing networks with versatile switches​

benefits.description: ​​Along production lines. Inside electric substations. At the airport and in roadway intersections. Catalyst IE9300 Rugged Series switches power almost all types of industry needs.​

benefits.title: Built-in, advanced security

benefits.description: With dual WAN uplinks, 12 LAN ports, Universal Power Over Ethernet (Cisco UPOE) technology, modularity to make future upgrades simple, and support for edge application advanced timing, the Catalyst IR8300 Rugged Series maximizes functionality in minimal space.

benefits.title: Reduced total cost of ownership
benefits.description: Speed up performance, get scale, and unlock value by integrating routing, security, and switching in one platform. Make upgrades easy with modules for public and private 5G, LTE, advanced timing, and much more.

benefits.title: Substation and timing compliance
benefits.description: Reliably and precisely synchronize network resources that host highly time-sensitive applications. The Catalyst IR8300 Rugged Series Router is also certified to meet substation compliance standards, including IEC 61850 and IEEE 1613.

title: IP67-rated modular router with embedded cyber-resilience
subtitle: Power and safeguard your critical services—without needing a protective cabinet. Get adaptable routers that offer robust resistance to dust and water, next-generation firewall capabilities, and more.
description: Mount these 5G routers outdoors, without a cabinet, for strong, reliable connections wherever you need them, with cellular, wide-area Cisco Resilient Mesh and Wi-SUN connectivity at scale.

benefits.title: Go to extremes
benefits.description: With IP67 ratings for dust and water protection, the Catalyst IR8100 Heavy Duty Series Routers are built to withstand extreme temperatures and the harshest environments. No protective cabinet needed.

benefits.title: Upgrade and adapt as you grow
benefits.description: The Catalyst IR8100 Heavy Duty Series might be the last outdoor routers you'll need for a long time. They're fully modular and upgradable onsite. Add 5G, backup batteries, power supply, and even new CPUs whenever you need them.

benefits.title: Become cyber-resilient
benefits.description: With router features ranging from a physical locking design to a variety of advanced cybersecurity capabilities—including next-generation firewall—you gain built-in protection for your remote operations.

benefits.title: Converge and scale​
benefits.description: Combine 5G, public and private LTE, wireless personal-area network (WPAN) such as Wi-SUN, and more—with adaptability for future connectivity. And it's all from a single router that can scale to the tens of thousands.

benefits.description: Reduce environmental impact with systems that consume less power (down to 0.3 watts per gigabit) and reduce manual and onsite operations through automation.

title: Enjoy a touchless, programmable optical network
subtitle: Get touchless programmability, massive scale, and performance for future-ready networks. The NCS 2000 Series is ideal for dense wavelength-division multiplexing (DWDM) solutions.
description: Become more efficient and handle long-distance data transmission and platform integration with ease.

benefits.title: Amplify long-distance data
benefits.description: Easily set up and simplify long-distance, high-speed data transmission with compact, hybrid Raman-EDFA amplifiers known as erbium doped Raman amplifiers (EDRA).

benefits.title: Get multilayer intelligence
benefits.description: Enhance Generalized Multiprotocol Label Switching (GMPLS) capabilities with awareness of wavelength properties and optical impairments using the Wavelength Switched Optical Network (WSON) control plane.

benefits.title: Simplify platform integration
benefits.description: Integrate the NCS 2000 Series with the NCS 4000 and 6000 Series for comprehensive support and better network performance across management levels. The 2000 Series offers full support for ONS 15454 MSTP line cards and more.

title: Connect data centers for massive growth
subtitle: Link your data centers to give your network and computing power a serious boost. The NCS 1000 Series is designed to tackle these tasks and more.
description: Do more and save more with compute capabilities and increased capacity.

benefits.title: Offer more to your customers
benefits.description: Bring programmability and control to your optical networks. Unlock new capabilities, capacity, and services.

benefits.title: Extend, manage, and see more
benefits.description: Increase your capacity, control, and visibility throughout your network.

benefits.title: Flexibly streamline operations
benefits.description: Simplify and automate your operations while scaling your dense wavelength-division multiplexing (DWDM) services with extreme flexibility.

benefits.title: Take action, sustainably
benefits.description: Act fast when traffic grows or in response to new services. Get industry-leading capacity and density and shrink your footprint with the Cisco NCS 1002.

benefits.title: Power cloud-scale networking
benefits.description: Upgrade your infrastructure to gain the agility, automation, and simplicity that your network needs.

preTitle: Cisco Network Convergence System (NCS) 540 Series Routers
title: Get better efficiency for better business outcomes
subtitle: Designed for both indoor and outdoor use, the temperature-hardened, compact NCS 540 Series is cost-effective with low power consumption—ideal for boosting efficiency across your services and applications.
description: Explore the features and benefits that can help you meet your business goals and stay one step ahead of the rest.

overview.title: Choose your speed
overview.content: Select from a comprehensive portfolio ranging from 64 Gbps to 900 Gbps.

overview.title: Strengthen your security
overview.content: Get modern, reliable security with the Cisco IOS XR advanced network OS.

overview.title: Optimize airflow
overview.content: Choose from side-to-side or front-to-back airflow designs.

overview.title: Unlock precise traffic control
overview.content: Enable Segment Routing for granular traffic engineering.

overview.title: Prioritize service quality
overview.content: Implement Quality of Service (QoS) capabilities across different service-level agreements (SLAs).

overview.title: Select your ideal port speed
overview.content: Flexible port options with 1/10/25/40/50/100/400 Gigabit Ethernet are available.

preTitle: Cisco Network Convergence System (NCS) 500 Series Routers
title: Scale your access networks with strategy
subtitle: Experience a platform designed for service providers. Support automation and programmability to provide 5G, Remote PHY, Carrier Ethernet, and Fiber-to-the-X (FTTX) solutions.
description: Bring your network into the future with modern innovations to help you build a network that will grow as you do.

benefits.title: Be 5G ready
benefits.description: The NCS 540 and NCS 560 are built for 5G with advanced timing, ultra-low latency, and ultra-high capacity. They provide the foundation for pervasive Mobile Broadband (MBB), large-scale Internet of Things (IoT), tactile Internet, smart cities, and more.

benefits.title: Automate, manage, and monitor
benefits.description: Create application-aware networks using segment routing, flexible interfaces with NETCONF, and YANG data models—all with real-time insights through streaming telemetry.

benefits.title: Build a more flexible network
benefits.description: Consolidate network services efficiently onto a single platform with our highly scalable, energy-efficient routers. Easily adjust capacity with ports that support speeds of 1/10/25/40/100 Gigabit Ethernet (GE).

benefits.title: Support sustainability
benefits.description: Improve energy efficiency and scalability with a robust network operating system that helps you reduce your network footprint and lower your carbon impact.

title: Hit the switch and see the light
subtitle: Build a network that unites data center and cloud. You'll wonder how you ever worked without it.
description: Built on Cisco silicon, the Cisco Nexus 9000 Series delivers industry-leading data center performance from the inside out.

benefits.title: 800G ports for heavy lifting
benefits.description: For data requirements big or small, multispeed ports have your back with full backward compatibility. They can flex and scale with you, while you handle the growth.

benefits.title: Seeing is securing
benefits.description: Toughen, tighten, and protect your network with streaming telemetry, advanced analytics, and line-rate encryption (MACsec).

benefits.title: The bottom line counts
benefits.description: Reduce operational costs with unified ports supporting 10/25G Ethernet and 8/16/32G Fibre Channel, RDMA over converged Ethernet (RoCE), and IP storage.

benefits.title: The speed you need
benefits.description: Dial in performance with intelligent buffers and zero packet drop for 50 percent faster application completion time.

title: Ultra-low-latency network platforms and switches
description: Reliably support your critical applications, scale connectivity as you need it, and handle whatever comes your way with optimum efficiency.

benefits.title: Ultra-low latency
benefits.description: The Nexus 3550-T Programmable Switch Platform is designed and optimized for ultra-low-latency applications.

benefits.title: Software-defined hardware
benefits.description: The Nexus 3550-T Programmable Switch Platform provides the performance characteristics of hardware plus Field Programmable Gate Array (FPGA) agility and the programmability of software.

benefits.title: Modular switch architecture
benefits.description: The Nexus 3550-F modular architecture provides the flexibility to scale connectivity options and implement FPGA device upgrades and functionality features.

benefits.title: High-density Layer 1 switching
benefits.description: The Nexus 3550-H models are high-density Layer 1 switches for date monitoring and distribution applications.

title: Switches built for business-critical performance
subtitle: Providing low latency and peak performance, these purpose-built switches support business-critical applications.
description: If low latency and high performance are your priorities, the Cisco Nexus 3000 Series, powered by Cisco NX-OS, is the right choice for your data center.

benefits.title: Simplified operations
benefits.description: Get consistent operations with Cisco NX-OS, a data center-class operating system built with modularity and serviceability.

benefits.title: Customize your network
benefits.description: Our API gives you a common programming approach across network switches.

benefits.title: Scale your network
benefits.description: VXLAN support with Switch-on-a-Chip (SoC) architecture delivers low-latency innovations in automation and time synchronization.

benefits.title: Guard against outages
benefits.description: Redundant, hot-swappable design helps keep everything up and running, while shared buffer space easily handles microbursts, streaming data, and jitter.

title: Simplify your data center network operations
subtitle: Configure, operate, and analyze your network from one place across data center networks.

integrations.title: Fabric Controller
integrations.description: Automate and provision classic Ethernet, SAN, IP Fabric for Media, and VXLAN networks, and manage Cisco Nexus switches, Cisco MDS, Cisco Catalyst, IOS-XR, and third-party devices.

integrations.title: Orchestrator
integrations.description: Automate Cisco ACI interconnects between Cisco ACI fabrics and implement consistent configuration and network policy for data centers with a configure once, deploy anywhere model.

integrations.title: Insights
integrations.description: Monitor and identify issues and troubleshoot Cisco data center networks running Cisco ACI or NX-OS with smart analytics, and minimize risk proactively with advanced AI-assisted resolutions.

title: Build unlimited data center fabrics—quickly, easily, anywhere
subtitle: Scale data center fabrics to anywhere and for any size with the simplified cloud management of Cisco Nexus Hyperfabric.

title: Embrace technology at the speed of your need
subtitle: Enjoy continuous innovation, greater flexibility, and a faster return on investment through software subscriptions.
description: Keep pace with your network's expanding demands using simple software updates. Customize a solution that fits your needs with easy-to-manage software options.

benefits.title: Access to innovation
benefits.description: Frequent feature releases power your journey to an intelligent network.

benefits.title: Evergreen security
benefits.description: Subscriptions help protect your network from the latest, most sophisticated security threats.

benefits.title: Licensing made smart
benefits.description: Activate easily, unify license management, and make your licensing flexible.

benefits.title: Linear, predictable spending
benefits.description: Subscriptions are a welcome replacement for hard-to-predict cost fluctuations.

dataModals.title: Access networking
dataModals.content: Automate, secure, and optimize your access networks through a single, streamlined dashboard. Experience end-to-end visibility and guidance, plus personalized services through location-based analytics. Easily scale and segment your network for security, compliance, and complex processes. Simply scale and secure your network with the Cisco Meraki cloud-first networking platform. Simplify operations, monetize SLA-backed services, and assure digital experiences across the access network. Deliver flexibility to manage your networks on premises, in the cloud, or in a hybrid environment

dataModals.title: WAN
dataModals.content: Control SD-WAN from the campus to the IoT edge to the cloud. Maintain state-of-the-art technology with software. Deliver industry-leading network security from anywhere with Meraki's cloud-managed networking platform. Simplify operations, monetize SLA-backed services, and assure digital experiences across the access network.

dataModals.title: Cloud networking
dataModals.content: Skillfully automate and operate your hybrid cloud network, using one centralized view. Automate anywhere and reduce downtime with our industry-leading software-defined networking solution. Get a broad range of software subscription and licensing options for your data center. Enable multidomain workflow automation across the Cisco Networking Cloud and beyond.

dataModals.title: Industrial IoT
dataModals.content: Gain visibility into your OT assets and your IoT security posture to protect operations from cyber threats. Easily secure remote access to your OT assets at scale to empower your operations team to do more. Manage field area networks at scale for utilities use cases. Improve efficiency with a simpler data flow from the IoT edge to multicloud business applications.

dataModals.title: Service providers and cloud operators
dataModals.content: Deliver services faster, operate more efficiently, and enhance responsiveness. Streamline your network with a modular OS that uses less memory and supports core or access devices. Manage every stage of service and subscriptions. Confidently open new markets and grow revenue by building your services edge with a trusted technology partner. Assure quality of experience in real time.

title: Gain end-to-end visibility and insights like never before.
subtitle: Create exceptional digital experiences built on deep network observability and critical network monitoring.
description: Boost efficiency and revenue with Cisco Provider Connectivity Assurance (formerly Accedian Skylight), delivering service assurance that continuously monitors and optimizes digital experiences.

benefits.title: Simplified operations and troubleshooting
benefits.description: Gain a single view of granular performance metrics and third-party data to accelerate MTTR.

benefits.title: Continuous optimization of digital experiences
benefits.description: Find transient issues with precise synthetic network and service testing.

benefits.title: Differentiated services, next-level innovation
benefits.description: Premium, SLA-backed services and end-customer portals are just a click away.

benefits.title: Predictive analytics powered by AI
benefits.description: Be proactive, not reactive. Put the power of your multivendor infrastructure to work for a trouble-free network.

title: Precision service assurance
subtitle: Collect precise and granular network, application, and service data.
description: Generate performance data with speed, precision, and efficiency—on any network or service type—with Cisco Provider Connectivity Assurance (formerly Accedian Skylight).

benefits.title: Millisecond test measurement frequency
benefits.description: Test with precision to identify the source of bottlenecks before they impact your users.

benefits.title: Microsecond accuracy for time-based measurements
benefits.description: Continuous network monitoring ensures peak performance and application delivery.

benefits.title: Detect even the smallest network interruption
benefits.description: Minimize retransmissions and reduce latency to with sub -1% packet loss detection.

benefits.title: Deploy with ease everywhere and at scale
benefits.description: Available in multiple hardware form factors and software configurations; deployable in virtual machines and containers.

dataModals.title: Key components
dataModals.content: Unleash the power of third-party performance data. Perform synthetic traffic testing with a microservices testing framework. Visualize performance data from Layer 2 to Layer 4 across multivendor networks with a virtualized probe. Track bandwidth use down to 1 ms with advanced assurance features using patented FPGA technology.

dataModals.title: Software sensors
dataModals.content: Deliver unmatched passive service and application monitoring with software probes that can decode more than 4,700 applications across 15 categories, with hundreds of Layer 2–7 transaction-based KPIs. Experience high-definition active testing, including TWAMP, TCP throughput, and traceroute, along with hundreds of Layer 3–7 network and service KPIs. Try our software probe for high-definition active testing, including TWAMP, Ethernet OAM, and ICMP echo, with hundreds of Layer 2–3 network and service performance KPIs.

dataModals.title: Hardware sensors
dataModals.content: Choose this compact 25 GE platform for low latency, ideal for high-bandwidth applications with MEF-type service assurance. Deploy this compact four-port, 100 GE platform for ultra-low latency–perfect for 5G, Ethernet, and service providers. Try this compact four-port, 10 GE platform for ultra—low latency for 5G, Ethernet, and service providers. Adopt an easy-to-use SFP service assurance for industry-standard testing and monitoring, including TWAMP, ICMP echo, Y.1731, service activation testing, and MEF service demarcation. Ensure high availability in MEF-type service assurance applications with this compact 1 or 10 GE platform with low latency. Enjoy this compact 1 GE option with ultra-low latency Ethernet for mobile or small business. A compact footprint for precise and scalable testing and monitoring, including TWAMP, ICMP echo, Y.1731, service activation testing, and MEF service demarcation.

title: Unleash operational simplicity, network efficiency, and energy savings
subtitle: Streamline management, upgrades, and services.
description: Discover the economic benefits of routed optical networks for DCI, metro, and long-haul applications.

benefits.title: Converge IP and optical
benefits.description: Reduce your CapEx up to 60% by simplifying your network transport with Cisco industry-leading, coherent pluggable optics that deliver DWDM functionality directly from router ports.

benefits.title: Lower environmental expenses
benefits.description: Decrease your power and facilities costs by up to 83% by lessening the need for transponders and optical transport equipment in your network.

benefits.title: Streamline network operations
benefits.description: Save up to 68% in OpEx by simplifying and accelerating network planning, operations, and troubleshooting with multilayer and multivendor automation, orchestration, performance monitoring, and assurance.

benefits.title: Ready your network for growth
benefits.description: Discover the future benefits of coherent pluggable optics that can expand your network capacity to 800G and extend your 400G transport to several thousand kilometers.

dataModals.title: Coherent pluggable optics
dataModals.content: Extend reach and compatibility in high insertion loss systems with better optical transmit power. Transmit 400G wavelengths up to 120 km with coherent ZR, and long-haul transmission with OpenZR+. Connect unamplified links point-to-point up to 45 km with 400G coherent wavelengths. Get optical amplifier/multiplexer functionality in a pluggable form factor deployed in routers.

dataModals.title: Routing platforms
dataModals.content: Scale to meet the needs of your infrastructure with this new class of routers. Handle metro traffic growth with the port density of the industry-leading 100 GbE and 400 GbE series. Improve your network flexibility and scalability with these high-performance routers. Scale up your access networks with a secure routing platform. Expand your bandwidth demands with these feature-rich routers that can help you power up to 5G. Extend 100G/400G/800G switching performance with high-speed data center interconnect.

dataModals.title: Network automation
dataModals.content: Advance closed-looped automation with visibility, data-driven insights, and intent-based actions.

dataModals.title: Service assurance
dataModals.content: Create digital experiences built on deep network observability and critical network monitoring.

dataModals.title: Optical networking
dataModals.content: Increase the capacity, control, and visibility throughout your network. Modernize with this next-generation, open optical line system.

dataModals.title: Service convergence
dataModals.content: Maintain SLAs and deliver wavelength services with circuit-style segment routing. Flexibly transfer wavelength services over MPLS networks while preserving signal characteristics.

title: Protect your hybrid workforce with cloud-agile security
subtitle: This cloud-delivered security service edge (SSE) solution, grounded in zero trust, gives users an exceptional user experience and protected access from any device to anywhere.
description: Enforce modern cybersecurity to radically reduce risk and delight users and IT staff by addressing today's challenge of safely connecting anything to anywhere.

benefits.title: Secure, remote access to all private apps
benefits.description: Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) uses least privilege principles, contextual insights, and client or clientless-based methods to deny access by default and allow access to apps when granted. VPN as a Service (VPNaaS)  extends coverage to non-ZTNA-enabled apps.

benefits.title: Defend users and resources from malware
benefits.description: Secure web gateway inspects web traffic, including encrypted files, for protection. Files are scanned, known malicious content is blocked, and unknown files are sandboxed and analyzed. Controls can block specific activities and destinations that violate policy.

benefits.title: Expose shadow IT and protect sensitive data
benefits.description: A Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB) discovers and controls SaaS cloud apps in use, including generative AI, and reports reputation, compliance, and risk scores. Data loss protection (DLP) protects against data exfiltration, and cloud malware detection removes infected files.

benefits.title: Provide traffic monitoring and inspection
benefits.description: Firewall as a service (FWaaS) with IPS examines non-web traffic at layers 3–7 and drops unsafe packets. The DLP module identifies and blocks ChatGPT content. Digital Experience Monitoring (DEM) tracks the performance of endpoints, networks, and core SaaS apps for faster issue detection.

title: Simplify security buying with a single agreement
subtitle: Get instant savings when you buy security software through one enterprise agreement that's easy to manage and consume.
description: Security threats are increasing in complexity. How you buy security should be simple and flexible. A Cisco Security Enterprise Agreement is designed to provide a simplified buying experience for all your security software needs.

benefits.title: Comprehensive solutions
benefits.description: Create a custom security software solution or select from our existing security offerings to address your security business needs.

benefits.title: Activate security fast
benefits.description: Easily obtain the security technology you need, when you need it, without complex and lengthy licensing processes or high contract minimums. Enter an agreement for as little as US$100K total contract value.

benefits.title: Add more, save more
benefits.description: Get price protection and penalty-free growth (up to 15% built in) with deeper discounts as you add more security products to your existing agreement.

benefits.title: Flexible payment options
benefits.description: Pay annually, as you go, over three or five years, with 0% financing. There is no surprise billing with overconsumption; simply adjust at your next billing cycle.

dataModals.title: Protection
dataModals.content: Get secure access to any application, on any device, from anywhere. Defend against threats targeting users and deliver seamless access for hybrid work. Secure your apps and data with a powerful, flexible framework for a hybrid and multicloud world. Secure your business by investigating, prioritizing, and resolving incidents through unified defense and contextual insights from data-backed, AI-powered security.

dataModals.title: Zero trust
dataModals.content: Establish user and device trust, gain visibility into devices, and simplify access management. Frictionless, highly secure network access control with software-defined access and automation. Stop threats from spreading and protect applications on any workload, across any environment.

dataModals.title: Cloud and network security
dataModals.content: Combines multiple security functions into one solution, protecting devices and remote users anywhere. Helps users securely and seamlessly access whatever they need to do their best work from anywhere. Provides integrations between core networking functions and network security for a secure architecture. Protects businesses by automatically blocking risky sites and testing unknown sites before allowing access.

dataModals.title: Security platform and response
dataModals.content: Offers endpoint protection across control points to stop threats before they compromise your business. Analyzes your existing network data to help detect threats before they can do serious damage. Detects the most sophisticated threats across vectors and prioritizes by impact for faster responses. Delivers protection against damaging and costly email threats that compromise your operations. Provides contextual insight and threat intelligence to intercept exploits and respond with precision.

title: Secure access is just the beginning
subtitle: ​Your teams need hassle-free access to corporate resources and private apps. You need to keep your business safe. Cisco Secure Access makes it happen.
description: Secure Client harnesses the powerful industry-leading AnyConnect VPN/ZTNA and helps IT and security professionals manage dynamic and scalable endpoint security agents in a unified view.

benefits.title: An intelligent VPN that's never off duty
benefits.description: ​You achieve security compliance, and your users get to connect to your VPN quickly and easily. It's a win-win.

benefits.title: Comprehensive endpoint security
benefits.description: ​Reduce your clients and enjoy advanced endpoint protection across control points within Secure Client.

benefits.title: Unified cloud management
benefits.description: See all your security agents on one screen with Secure Client's single-cloud management console.

benefits.title: Greater network visibility
benefits.description: Monitor endpoint application usage and user behavior when coupled with Cisco Secure Network Analytics.

integrations.title: Cisco XDR
integrations.description: Detect the most sophisticated threats sooner across all vectors and prioritize by impact for faster responses.

integrations.title: Cisco Secure Endpoint module
integrations.description: With advanced endpoint protection across control points, your business is safer from threats, and more resilient.

integrations.title: Cisco Umbrella Roaming module
integrations.description: ​Cloud-delivered security from Cisco Secure Client protects your users even when they're off the VPN.

title: Protecting business resilience and secure network availability
subtitle: Explore our flexible distributed denial of service (DDoS) deployment options, award-winning service, and industry-leading service-level agreements (SLAs).

integrations.title: Cloud DDoS
integrations.description: On-demand, always-on, or hybrid? We give organizations the widest security coverage to defend them from today's DDoS attacks.

integrations.title: On-premises DDoS
integrations.description: Security options include web application firewall (WAF), threat intelligence, advanced analytics, secure socket layer (SSL) traffic inspection, cloud signaling, and hybrid DDoS protection.

integrations.title: DDoS on Firepower
integrations.description: Cisco Firepower 4100 Series and 9300 appliances have enterprise-grade DDoS mitigation capabilities with Virtual DefensePro (vDP).

title: Endpoint security built for resilience
subtitle: Speed matters when it comes to endpoint security. Detect, respond, and recover from attacks with our cloud-native solution, and reduce remediation times by as much as 85 percent.
description: The sooner threats are detected, the faster businesses can recover. Secure Endpoint offers advanced endpoint protection across control points, enabling your business to stay resilient.

benefits.title: Powerful EDR capabilities
benefits.description: Stop threats with built-in or completely managed endpoint detection and response (EDR), threat hunting, and integrated risk-based vulnerability management from Kenna Security.

benefits.title: USB device control
benefits.description: Create, view, and manage rules so only approved USB devices are used in your environments. Deep visibility lets you see events like blocked devices when investigating compromises in device trajectory.

benefits.title: Integrated XDR capabilities
benefits.description: You get a unified view, simplified incident management, and automated playbooks with Cisco XDR, making our extended detection and response (XDR) approach the broadest in the industry.

benefits.title: Built-in Talos Threat Hunting
benefits.description: A resilient business is proactive. Thwart attacks before they cause damage, while also preparing for the future, with our human-driven threat hunting that maps to the MITRE ATT&CK framework.

title: More uptime. Better security. Simpler operations.
subtitle: Secure remote access to your ICS and OT assets, and easily enforce cybersecurity controls at scale with our zero trust network access (ZTNA) solution made for industrial networks and harsh environments.
description: Securing remote access to operational technology (OT) assets has never been easier—or more scalable. Operate with better efficiency and get peace of mind with Cisco Secure Equipment Access.

benefits.title: Boost operational efficiency
benefits.description: Empower your operations team, contractors, and OEMs to remotely maintain and troubleshoot ICS and OT assets with an easy-to-use industrial remote access solution.

benefits.title: Enforce zero trust controls in OT
benefits.description: Configure least-privilege access based on identity and context policies. Enforce security controls such as schedules, device posture, single sign-on (SSO), and multifactor authentication (MFA).

benefits.title: Install and scale with ease
benefits.description: Stop struggling with complex firewall and DMZ setups. Secure Equipment Access embeds ZTNA into your Cisco industrial switches and routers so you can reach more assets, reduce the attack surface, and deploy at scale.

benefits.title: Access any remote asset the way you want
benefits.description: You just need a web browser. Clientless ZTNA supports SSH, RDP, VNC, Telnet, and HTTP(S). Agent-based ZTNA lets you use any desktop application for advanced maintenance tasks.

integrations.title: Reach more assets with remote access built into network equipment
integrations.description: Easily turn your Cisco industrial switches or routers into ZTNA gateways, and access assets anywhere they are. It’s that simple.

integrations.title: Don't let stolen credentials or malware hit you
integrations.description: Verify user identity with multifactor authentication (MFA) and confirm alignment of device hygiene with your security policies.

integrations.title: Secure Equipment Access At-a-Glance
integrations.description: Get the essential facts on Cisco Secure Equipment Access.

integrations.title: Reference architecture for ZTNA in OT
integrations.description: This Cisco Validated Design guide provides guidance to help you implement ZTNA in your operational environment.

integrations.title: Empower your network to secure operations
integrations.description: Deploy OT remote access at scale simply and cost-effectively with the ZTNA gateway embedded into your network equipment.

integrations.title: 4 steps to prepare your OT for NIS2
integrations.description: Find out how Cisco can help you to become NIS2 compliant.

integrations.title: Award-winning secure remote access solution
integrations.description: Secure Equipment Access wins IoT Security Innovation of the Year award for its zero-trust network architecture for OT.​

integrations.title: Explore product resources
integrations.description: Explore a wealth of information to discover how Secure Equipment Access can help to meet your organization's needs.

title: Solid performance and visibility for data centers
subtitle: Experience faster threat detection with greater visibility and the agility to safeguard large enterprise data center and campus networks.
description: Secure your large enterprise data center now, and prepare for the future, with superior performance and visibility that maximize your return on investment.

benefits.title: Detect risks faster with a smaller footprint
benefits.description: Get twice the throughput and a high-performance network interface in a single rack unit and secure your large enterprise's campus and data center in a slim form factor, boosting operational efficiency.

benefits.title: Scale as your business grows
benefits.description: Support your future growth with high-port density and clustering flexibilities. Bring up to 16 firewall devices together to act all as a single powerful firewall, enabling massive business expansion.

benefits.title: Gain visibility over encrypted traffic
benefits.description: Speed up traffic decryption to gain deeper visibility in real time with crypto accelerator. When privacy is your concern, use encrypted visibility engine to stop encrypted threats without decryption.

benefits.title: Limit access to applications
benefits.description: With zero trust application access (ZTAA), go beyond the traditional "authorize then ignore" zero trust network access (ZTNA) model by adding complete threat inspection for applications, limiting risks.

title: An enterprise-class firewall for your hybrid work
subtitle: Protect your enterprises and remote workers with the firewall that boosts hybrid work performance while adapting to your evolving business needs.
description: The 3100 Series firewall makes hybrid work and zero trust practical with the flexibility to help ensure strong return over investment.

benefits.title: Enable hybrid work
benefits.description: The 3100 Series firewalls are designed to support more hybrid workers. Whether working from home, airport, or coffee shop, your remote workers can now enjoy up to 17 times faster VPN performance.

benefits.title: Protect your investment
benefits.description: The 3100 Series firewalls help ensure strong return over investment. Its clustering and high port density flexibility allow your security infrastructure to grow with you.

benefits.title: Delight your employees
benefits.description: The 3100 Series firewalls deliver 7 times higher inspection throughput and application-based quality of service (QoS), enabling users to securely experience strong video conferencing.

benefits.title: See more, know more
benefits.description: The 3100 Series firewalls use machine learning technologies to passively identify user applications and potential threats in encrypted traffic, without decryption, to detect more malware.

title: Unified security for distributed enterprises
subtitle: Protect your enterprise branches with an all-in-one compact firewall with up to three times the performance of comparable firewalls.
description: A host of new detection technologies and operational enhancements to simplify security at distributed enterprises.

benefits.title: Secure more branches, faster
benefits.description: Experience simplified onboarding across multiple branches with built in secure branch routing templates and zero-touch provisioning. Deploy unified policy at once to hundreds of firewalls and gain visibility over the entire enterprise.

benefits.title: Greater speed in smaller footprint
benefits.description: Gain a performance advantage of up to three times that of similar firewalls for branch workers connecting through a secure branch routing firewall with enhanced Cisco Universal Power Over Ethernet (Cisco UPOE+) or small form-factor (SFP+) ports.

benefits.title: Leverage AI to manage daily tasks
benefits.description: Automate policy creation, optimization, and reporting with the Cisco AI Assistant. The solution enables tailored service, directly from its management console, and is available in both on-prem and cloud options.

benefits.title: Foil threats with machine learning
benefits.description: Block zero-day exploits with the new SnortML machine-learning detection engine, along with AI-assisted encrypted threat and application blocking by the Encrypted Visibility Engine.

title: Take control with a single pane of glass
subtitle: Centralize and simplify your firewall admin and intrusion prevention. With visibility across ever-changing and global networks, you can manage modern applications and malware outbreaks in real time.

title: Security for your business is 100% our business
subtitle: Outsmart emerging threats with industry-leading machine learning and behavioral modeling that never quits.
description: Analyze your existing network data to help detect threats that may have found a way to bypass your existing controls, before they can do serious damage.

benefits.title: Forewarned is forearmed
benefits.description: Detect attacks in real time across the dynamic network with high-fidelity alerts enriched with context, including user, device, location, timestamp, and application.

benefits.title: Reduce policy violations
benefits.description: Validate the efficacy of policies, adopt the right ones based on your environment's needs, and streamline policy violation investigations.

benefits.title: Reveal the unknown
benefits.description: Use advanced analytics to quickly detect unknown malware, insider threats like data exfiltration and policy violations, and other sophisticated attacks.

benefits.title: Analyze with ease
benefits.description: Identify and isolate threats in encrypted traffic without compromising privacy and data integrity.

integrations.title: Where network nuances are never a problem
integrations.description: Use Secure Network Analytics with Identity Services Engine (ISE) to define smarter segmentation policies, create custom alerts to detect unauthorized access, and ensure compliance.

integrations.title: Advanced network monitoring and threat detection
integrations.description: Cisco Secure Network Analytics + Splunk delivers deep visibility, optimized data management, and advanced threat detection, transforming your network into a sensor for enhanced security.

integrations.title: Security operations simplified
integrations.description: Detect the most sophisticated threats sooner across all vectors and prioritize by impact for faster responses.

title: Confidently defend against advanced threats
subtitle: Protect your organization by automatically blocking risky sites and testing unknown sites before allowing users access.
description: Deliver outstanding web protection before, during, and after an attack with Cisco Secure Web Appliance.

benefits.title: Strong threat protection
benefits.description: Secure every device through a sophisticated global threat-intelligence infrastructure, powered by Cisco Talos, and stay ahead of threats with industry-leading visibility and actionable intelligence.

benefits.title: Granular controls
benefits.description: Enable advanced control of all web traffic, including dynamic web content such as social media applications, and block risky behaviors without hindering user productivity.

benefits.title: Flexible deployment
benefits.description: Scale and evolve as your organizational needs change. Deploy Cisco Secure Web Appliance as a hardware appliance, virtual machine, or in the public cloud using Amazon Web Services and Microsoft Azure.

benefits.title: Open, integrated security platform
benefits.description: Integrate everything in your environment to unify visibility, enable automation, and strengthen protection.

title: Reduce your attack surface with zero trust microsegmentation
subtitle: Stop threats from spreading and protect the applications that power your business with zero trust microsegmentation, on any workload, across any environment.
description: Do you know what your applications are doing? Take control of your applications and drive security resilience with Secure Workload to protect the data your business relies on.

benefits.title: Enforce zero trust consistently, accurately
benefits.description: Designed for scale and speed, Secure Workload makes zero trust achievable by consistently and accurately enforcing microsegmentation across your entire application landscape—any workload, any location.

benefits.title: Industry-leading visibility and automation
benefits.description: Your single source of truth, providing comprehensive visibility into every workload interaction, powering best-practice policy recommendations and automation tailored to your environment and applications.

benefits.title: Stronger security from day one
benefits.description: Don't compromise. Strengthen your security posture, reduce risk, and decrease costs associated with application downtime at every step in your zero-trust journey.

benefits.title: Security at the speed of applications
benefits.description: Rapidly respond to application changes. Near real-time alerts, automated policies, and forensics with an auditable record help you quickly close security gaps and improve your posture.

title: Security operations simplified
subtitle: Go from endless investigation to remediating the highest priority incidents with AI-enhanced speed, efficiency, and decisiveness.

integrations.title: Endpoint telemetry and response integrations
integrations.description: Seamlessly integrate popular endpoint detection and response tools to extend security investments.

integrations.title: Cloud and network telemetry and response integrations
integrations.description: Easily connect cloud, network, and firewall security tools to gain insights across your environment.

integrations.title: Email telemetry and response integrations
integrations.description: Effortlessly integrate email and applications data from leading solutions to deliver secure access.

integrations.title: Cisco Secure Endpoint
integrations.description: Stay ahead of the latest threats with simplified, automated endpoint security.

integrations.title: Cisco Secure Email Threat Defense
integrations.description: Protect against damaging and costly email threats that can compromise your brand and operations.

integrations.title: Cisco Secure Network Analytics
integrations.description: Achieve powerful network visibility to find sophisticated, covert threats and suspicious behavior.

integrations.title: Cisco Breach Protection Suite
integrations.description: Accelerate response across the most prominent attack vectors—network, email, cloud, and endpoint—unified by Cisco XDR.

preTitle: Security Suites delivered by the Cisco Security Cloud
title: Efficacy above all else
subtitle: Improve security experiences, efficacy, and ROI by unifying infrastructure for maximum flexibility.
description: Secure everything and everyone your network touches. Cloud-native and cloud-delivered, Cisco Security Cloud is powered by AI to deliver effective, scalable protection.

benefits.title: Increase efficiency
benefits.description: Protect your business across multicloud and hybrid environments, while simplifying security operations and improving scalability.

benefits.title: Create a seamless experience
benefits.description: Frustrate attackers, not users, by granting access from any device, anywhere, and adding more proactive security controls.

benefits.title: Improve ROI
benefits.description: Consolidate vendors, reduce complexity, and integrate your security for maximum resilience.

title: More speed. Less risk. Unwavering availability.
description: Get the highest quality, performance-leading optical transceivers for any network architecture.

benefits.title: Deliver connectivity users can count on
benefits.description: Get access to global supply chain diversity, fulfillment, and support that reduce the risk of disruption.

benefits.title: Experience round-the-clock reliability
benefits.description: Keep your network up and running with reliable optics that are rigorously tested, qualified, and validated.

benefits.title: Plug innovation into your network
benefits.description: Speed up your network and lower your costs with innovations in optics technology and manufacturing.

dataModals.title: Optical transceivers
dataModals.content: Double your port capacity. Get QSFP-DD800, with backward compatibility to lower-speed QSFP transceivers. Migrate to 400G with QSFP-DD transceivers that provide super-high density and backward compatibility. Deploy high-density transceiver modules for data center AI/ML applications and high-performance computing networks. Get high-density connectivity in your data center, compute, and service provider networks. Implement high-capacity connectivity for service provider, enterprise, and data center applications. Meet high-performance connectivity needs of campus, data center, and cloud deployments. Support a variety of port types with transceivers optimized for 10G applications.

dataModals.title: Coherent pluggable optics
dataModals.content: Extend reach and compatibility in high insertion loss systems with better optical transmit power. Transmit 400G wavelengths up to 120 km with coherent ZR, and long-haul transmission with OpenZR+. Connect unamplified links point to point up to 45 km with 400G coherent wavelengths. Connect unamplified links point to point up to 80 km with 100G coherent wavelengths. Get software configurable line rates and modulation for long-reach amplified DWDM or dark fiber systems. Support line rates up to 400 Gbps over a single-fiber bidirectional transmission. Get optical amplifier/multiplexer functionality in a pluggable form factor deployed in routers.

dataModals.title: High-density fiber management
dataModals.content: Simplify optical connectivity with patch panel and cable assemblies for 4x10 to 400G breakout.

dataModals.title: Service assurance sensors
dataModals.content: Simplify the deployment of service assurance with granular, real-time performance visibility.

dataModals.title: Routed PON modules
dataModals.content: Simplify the network by replacing an OLT chassis with a router-deployed pluggable module.

title: Wireless you can depend on. Easy to deploy.
subtitle: Confidently connect even your most demanding applications. Give your users an exceptional experience with an easy-to-deploy wireless network that offers high-speed reliability, low latency, and seamless handoffs.
description: Connect confidently with ultra-reliable wireless backhaul technology. From automated guided vehicles in manufacturing to tele-remote applications in ports and mines and beyond.

benefits.title: Connect with confidence—every time
benefits.description: Rest easy knowing that your most critical assets are connected—even with obstacles and RF interference. Our Multipath Operations technology protects your critical communications around the clock.

benefits.title: Get connected fast with easy deployment
benefits.description: Get ahead of the curve with a wireless network that's quick and easy to deploy. Your Wi-Fi–savvy teams can set up our ultra-reliable wireless backhaul (URWB) quickly—it's built on 802.11 standards and deploys just like Wi-Fi.

benefits.title: Discover speed and security—together
benefits.description: Get a wireless network that matches the high-performance demands and data rates of your applications. Deliver a smoother experience with ultra-low latency, seamless handoffs, and built-in security.

benefits.title: Extend your wireless anywhere
benefits.description: Connect buildings and fixed assets with long-range, high-throughput wireless connectivity that works anywhere that fiber is too costly or is not an option.

dataModals.title: Cisco Catalyst IW products
dataModals.content: Get versatile positioning in your network with tri-radio. Plus, MIMO 4×4 and multigigabit speeds. Enjoy easy integration in moving assets with a compact form, dual radio, 2×2, and two spatial streams. Easily set up wireless backhaul with built-in directional antenna and choice of external antennas (2 × N type). Catalyst IW radio traffic aggregator for large-scale deployments. Based on Cisco UCS C220 M6 Server.

dataModals.title: Management solutions
dataModals.content: Configure and roll out Cisco Catalyst IW wireless backhaul devices with IoT Operations Dashboard. Monitor and maintain URWB networks with real-time data, KPIs, and situation alerts from all URWB devices.

title: Your first line of defense against online threats
subtitle: Cisco Umbrella is the simplest way to protect all your users, everywhere, in minutes.
description: Cisco Umbrella uses the internet's infrastructure to enforce security at the cloud edge and block malicious activity before a connection is ever established.

benefits.title: Integrated security from the cloud
benefits.description: Gain cloud-delivered security with flexible cybersecurity protection on and off network, consistent policies across remote locations, and better performance and user satisfaction everywhere.

benefits.title: Better intelligence drives better security
benefits.description: Umbrella processes over 700 billion internet requests a day to uncover threats before they reach your network or endpoints.

benefits.title: Block malware easily
benefits.description: Experience effective, reliable protection against phishing, malware, and ransomware. Umbrella blocks threats easily over all ports and protocols for the most comprehensive coverage.

benefits.title: Speed up and improve incident response
benefits.description: See the relationships between malware, domains, IPs, and networks across the internet. Our threat intelligence learns from internet activity patterns to identify attacker infrastructure being staged for the next threat.

title: Risk prioritization powered by intelligence
subtitle: As threats multiply and environments become more complex, resources remain finite. Prioritize your risks and make better decisions faster with risk-based vulnerability management.
description: Cisco Vulnerability Management equips you with the contextual insight and threat intelligence needed to intercept the next exploit and respond with precision.

benefits.title: Reduce risk
benefits.description: Prioritization is no longer a dark art—it's data science. Advanced algorithms, combined with rich internal and external intel, offer recommended fixes that will lower risk in as few moves as possible.

benefits.title: Predict and prevent the next exploit
benefits.description: Track vulnerability fluctuations and forecast weaponization with up to 94% accuracy, giving you the chance to remediate high-risk vulnerabilities before bad actors can mount an attack.

benefits.title: Assess the full threat landscape
benefits.description: With more than 19 threat intelligence feeds at your fingertips, you gain a comprehensive view of emerging threats, shifting trends, and your own risk profile.

benefits.title: Improve efficiency and communication
benefits.description: A single source of data-verified truth aligns security and IT, eliminating friction and freeing up resources. And intuitive, simplified risk scores help you generate reports anyone can understand.

integrations.title: Risk-based endpoint security with Cisco Secure Endpoint
integrations.description: Cisco Vulnerability Management integrates with Cisco Secure Endpoint for vulnerability detection and prioritization.

integrations.title: Rich threat intelligence with Talos
integrations.description: Discover how Cisco Talos equips teams with zero-day vulnerability intelligence.

integrations.title: Simplify your SOC with Cisco XDR
integrations.description: Cisco XDR detects and responds to threats faster, boosting your risk-based vulnerability management.

preTitle: Cisco 6300 Series Embedded Services Access Points
title: Embed Cisco Wi-Fi into your solutions
description:
Give your smart city or high-value industrial assets pervasive wireless that is reliable, scalable, and secure. The Cisco 6300 Series Embedded Services Access Points offer built-in security, resilient wireless mesh capabilities, and are designed for integration with your hardware.
Enhance your solutions with digital transformation from the worldwide leader in networking.

features.title: Wi-Fi integration for challenging use cases
features.description: Get access points purpose-built for integration into smart-city and industrial environments.

features.title: Intelligence beyond boundaries
features.description: Extend policy and visibility from the enterprise to the edge with Cisco's intent-based networking together with the 6300 Embedded Services Access Points, which streamlines network management and helps reduce costs. Use Cisco IOx container support to host IoT applications at the edge for faster decision making.

features.title: Enhanced connectivity and flexibility
features.description: You'll get resilient 802.11ac Wave 2, with three PoE ports, one SFP port, and one USB port.

features.title: Deployment almost anywhere
features.description: Cisco 6300 Series Access Points are designed for the most extreme environments and temperatures (-40 to 85 degrees C).

resources.title: Cisco 6300 Series Embedded Services Access Points data sheet

preTitle: Cisco 5000 Series Enterprise Network Compute System
title: Optimized enterprise NFV platform
description: The Cisco ENCS is a hybrid platform that combines the functionality of a traditional router and a traditional server with a smaller infrastructure footprint.

features.description: The 5000 Series is a purpose-built compute platform optimized to run VNFs. Using VNFs saves time and simplifies operations. Zero-touch automation enables fast and flawless branch deployments and management.
The 5000 Series' modular architecture enables flexibility to address your specific needs for capacity and connectivity as your organization or demands change.
Cisco's open-ecosystem approach to Network Functions Virtualization (NFV) in the 5000 Series enables other vendors to have their VNFs certified to help ensure compatibility and interoperability.

title: Prevent threats and secure your industrial control systems
description: Cisco's industrial security appliance is a foundational component of your IoT/OT security journey. It bundles the proven security of Cisco Secure firewalls with the visibility and control of industrial protocols and applications from automation vendors such as Omron, Rockwell, GE, Schneider, Siemens, and others. The ISA3000 is the ideal ruggedized firewall to segment industrial networks, protect OT assets from potential threats, and build compliance so that you can capture the benefits of your industrial digitization efforts.

resources.title: ARC white paper: Cisco Enables Active Defense of Industrial Operations

title: Deploy enterprise-class WPAN communications
description: Cisco 500 Series wireless personal area network (WPAN) industrial routers provide unlicensed 915-MHz industrial, scientific, and medical band WPAN communications. They help enable a diverse set of Internet of Things applications, including smart metering, smart grids, distribution automation, supervisory control and data acquisition, and street lighting.

features.title: Key hardware and software capabilities
features.description: These routers have a rugged industrial hardware design and a highly resilient architecture. They increase the uptime of communications networks and grid availability to help ensure message delivery. Choose from multiple platforms.

features.title: Distribution automation gateway platform
features.description: Built to withstand harsh environments, the IR510 model provides enterprise-class RF mesh connectivity to Ethernet- and serial-enabled IoT devices like recloser controls, cap bank controls, and voltage regulator controls.

features.title: Range-extender platform
features.description: The ruggedized IR530 model platforms provide range extension functionality to enhance the RF mesh reliability by adding paths and nodes. They also enable connectivity in low-end point density deployments.

title: Stop more threats with the threat-focused 5500-X NGFW
description: Beat sophisticated cyber attacks with a superior security appliance. We offer the industry’s first threat-focused next-generation firewall (NGFW), the ASA 5500-X Series.

features.description: Stay more secure. This NGFW has earned the highest security effectiveness scores in third-party testing for both NGIPS and AMP, blocking 99.4% and 99.2% of threats, respectively.

Get visibility into and control over activity across your network. Gain insight into users, apps, devices, threats, files, and vulnerabilities. Extend protection from the data center to mobile devices. It’s all possible with our Firepower Management Center.

Our integrated approach to threat defense reduces capital and operating costs as well as administrative complexity by consolidating multiple security services in a single platform. Automate security tasks to increase agility and speed remediation.

We have the platform for you: standalone options for small and midsize businesses, ruggedized appliances for extreme environments, midsize appliances for security at the Internet edge, and high-performance appliances for enterprise data centers.

preTitle: Cisco ASR 900 Series Aggregation Services Routers
title: Full-featured, efficient aggregation platform
description: The ASR 900 Series is a modular aggregation platform that delivers cost-effective converged mobile, residential, and business services. You get redundancy, a shallow depth, low power consumption, and high service scale in routers packed with useful features and optimized for small aggregation and remote point-of-presence (POP) applications.

features.title: Broadband aggregation
features.description: Deliver a greatly enhanced broadband customer experience. This series supports broadband aggregation for voice, video, data, and mobility services. It supports thousands of subscribers, and QoS scales to a large number of queues per device.

features.title: Pre-aggregation for mobile applications
features.description: Deployed as a pre-aggregation platform for mobile backhaul, the series can aggregate cell sites and use MPLS as a transport for RAN backhaul traffic.

features.title: Timing services
features.description: Get the timing services required in today’s converged access networks. The series offers integrated support for a variety of interfaces and can act as the source for network clocking for GPS and other interfaces.

features.title: Suitable for harsh environments
features.description: Because of its shallow depth and qualification for extended temperature ranges, the series can be deployed in small and harsh environments.

features.title: Metro Ethernet Aggregation
features.description: Built to meet service provider requirements for Carrier Ethernet aggregation, the series is optimized for remote central office and smaller sites that need a full-featured, modular, small-footprint, fully redundant aggregation platform.

preTitle: Cisco ATA 190 Series Analog Telephone Adapters
title: Turn Analog Devices into IP Devices
description: The Cisco ATA 190 Series Analog Telephone Adapters enable you to turn analog devices, such as phones, fax machines and paging systems into IP devices. The 190 Series are Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) endpoints that are managed from your IP network. They’re ideal for customers with enterprise networks, small offices and UCaaS from the cloud.

features.title: Full-featured telephony with natural voice
features.description: Wide range of software telephony features make ATA 190 Series a great fit for daily use and protect your analog investments with transition to IP networks. Advanced acoustics deliver business-grade VoIP communications.

features.title: Enhanced serviceability
features.description: The ATA 190 series delivers advanced debugging and diagnostic tools. A dedicated problem reporting tool (PRT) enables timely reporting and log collection for local IT or for service providers.

features.title: Enterprise-grade security
features.description: The ATA 190 Series supports the latest encryption with Transport Layer Security (TLS), Secure Hash Algorithm (SHA-2) and new Secure Real-time Protocol (sRTP) cipher suites.

title: Carrier-grade cloud service for faster time to market
description: BroadCloud is a global platform hosted by Cisco that lets service providers deploy a full suite of calling and collaboration applications. Applications can be scaled to meet the needs of enterprises, no matter what size or industry.

benefits.description: BroadCloud's pay-as-you-go model helps Cisco partners penetrate the rapidly growing cloud-calling market with minimal up-front investment and risk.

title: Leading cloud calling and collaboration
description:
Cisco BroadWorks is an enterprise-grade calling and collaboration platform delivering unmatched performance, security and scale. 
Hosted by Cisco service provider partners, it integrates with Cisco Webex to meet the full range of enterprise communications and collaboration needs.

benefits.description: Cisco BroadWorks offers mission-critical security, quality and reliability, providing up to 99.999% availability with full redundancy. It supports all region/country regulation for security, data privacy and law enforcement.

title: Building blocks for small business networks
description:
The Cisco Business 350 Series Managed Switches are reliable building blocks for the small business network. With an intuitive dashboard, advanced features, and pervasive security, the Cisco Business 350 Series Managed Switches are positioned to accelerate your digital transformation.

Build a fast, resilient network with the Cisco Business 110 Series Unmanaged Switches. These affordable, plug-and-play, entry-level switches provide Gigabit Ethernet switching with features such as Power over Ethernet (PoE), energy efficiency, and traffic prioritization for seamless digital transformation.
Starting at

benefits.title: Simplicity
benefits.description: Plug-and-play without a need for IT know-how or support.

title: Scalable collaboration for enterprises
description: Empower your employees to engage and innovate anywhere, on any device, any time, with industry-leading technology. Cisco Business Edition 7000 is an all-in-one, end-to-end collaboration solution designed for fast-growing enterprises.

benefits.title: Improve productivity
benefits.description: Delight your users with interactive, intuitive, easy-to-use collaboration.

modal.title: 7000M
content: Built for large enterprises
Optimized for over 1,000 users
Supports more than 3000 devices
Supports four to six collaboration applications

features.title: Voice over IP phone system (VoIP)
features.description: Comprehensive Unified Communications capabilities including voice and video calling, voicemail, messaging and presence, contact center and mobility options for every user.

features.title: Easy installation and management
features.description: It’s preloaded with all the essential collaboration applications you need, and simple to deploy and manage.  Consolidate your communications infrastructure costs and reduce maintenance overheads.

features.title: Flexible premises and hybrid cloud deployment
features.description: Deploy essential communications on-premises and add the latest meetings and messaging services from the Cisco Webex collaboration cloud.

features.title: Scalable design for future growth
features.description: It’s purpose-built for small and midsize businesses with the industry’s leading Cisco Unified Communications Manager. It grows with the pace of your business as you add new users or locations.

title: Complete collaboration for midsized businesses
description:
Your employees want to connect with co-workers, customers, and business partners from anywhere, using any device. Cisco Business Edition 6000 is more than just an IP phone system. It is an all-in-one solution that solves complex communications challenges for business with up to 1,000 employees.
 
Read customer reviews

title: Simplicity, flexibility, and security
description: Cisco Catalyst 1300 Series Switches provide simplicity, flexibility, and security for small and medium-sized business (SMB) networks. With an intuitive dashboard, advanced features, and pervasive security, these managed access switches are positioned to accelerate your digital transformation.

benefits.title: Simplicity
benefits.description: Use the intuitive dashboard to automate the deployment, monitoring, and lifecycle management of your switches.

title: Affordability and performance
description: Cisco Catalyst 1200 Series Switches are the latest in affordable smart switches that combine powerful network performance, simplified management, and reliability with a comprehensive suite of network features that you need for a solid small business network.

benefits.title: Flexibility
benefits.description: Get 8 to 48 ports of Gigabit Ethernet connectivity, GE or 10-GE uplinks, and PoE+ support.

title: Simplicity, flexibility, and security
description: Cisco Catalyst 1000 Series switches provide enterprise-grade network access sized for small businesses. With a wide range of Power over Ethernet (PoE) and port combinations, these easy-to-manage switches provide the performance a modern small office needs.

modal.title: Compact form-factor models
content: Compact, fanless models with a depth of less than 13 inches (33 cm)
8x and 16x 1G downlinks
2 SFP/ RJ-45 uplinks
Internal or external power supply
Up to 240W PoE
Over-the-air (OTA) Bluetooth access

preTitle: Cisco Catalyst Digital Building Series Switches
title: Make buildings smarter
description:
Save on energy costs and enhance flexibility, safety, and productivity. Our Catalyst Digital Building plenum-rated UPOE fan-less switches are designed for smart buildings and optimized for low-voltage PoE. Combine lighting, air conditioning, security systems, and more on one IP network with seamless security and easy installation and management.
 
Read customer reviews

benefits.title: Intelligence and automation
benefits.description: Catalyst Digital Building Series Switches give you smart, simple, and highly secure access in a very compact and rugged standalone form factor.  The smart and easy mobile installation app helps you install the switch in a snap.

modal.title: Catalyst Digital Building Series Switch – 8U
content: 480W of UPOE power (60W per port)
8 x 10/100 UPOE ports, 2 x 10/100/1000 uplinks
Fan-less design
Fixed power supply
Enhanced Limited Lifetime Warranty (E-LLW)

preTitle: Cisco Catalyst ESS9300 Embedded Series Switch
title: Secure, ruggedized embedded network switch
description: The Catalyst ESS9300 Embedded Series Switch is designed for custom networking for mission-critical applications in extreme environments. Its advanced features, optimized size, weight, and power, robust security, and support for open standards make it ideal for industries like defense, mining, and oil and gas.

modal.title: Catalyst ESS9300-10X-E
content: 10 x 10GE ports
Advanced security features
FIPS-140 and MIL-STD-810H certifications
Low power consumption
Network Essentials license

features.title: Compact design
features.description: Made for industrial IoT embedded systems and ideal for applications that require compact design

features.title: Speed and security
features.description: Provides up to 10-Gigabit Ethernet (10GE) ports to support high-throughput applications, and features crucial security features for mission-critical networks

features.title: Rugged for extreme environments
features.description: Withstands extreme temperatures, shock, and vibration, helping Cisco partners and integrators to provide rugged embedded networking solutions

features.title: Advanced Cisco IOS XE operating system
features.description: Runs the enterprise-grade Cisco IOS XE operating system, which offers advanced switching and security features

features.title: Open standards
features.description: Available as a mezzanine card for building switching modules conformant to the OpenVPX standard, adopted by the U.S. Department of Defense for aerospace and defense applications

features.title: Custom networking use cases
features.description: Can be used by Cisco partners along with complementary technologies to build tailored, scalable, innovative solutions that meet specific requirements
